intro_only_event_multi_ch0336_00_mimoza_: Ooooh, this takes me back!
Oh, hi! Got a moment?
I’m Miriam. I teach health back in Paldea.

But now I’ll also be teaching at
Pasio Academy!
That said...

I’ve only just arrived on Pasio, so I’m not
used to battling as a sync pair.

But I should brush up on my skills if I want
to build a relationship with the students here!
So...could you battle with me?
Thanks! It’d be a huge help!
You seem pretty strong, so go easy on me.

Hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]. Thanks for
the help last time.

Thanks to you, I already got the hang of
sync moves!
Nooooooo!
I can’t believe they sold out again!

They sell only a handful of Pasio chocolates
per day, and I really wanted to taste them...
Do you like sweets?
Hm? Yup! Sure do!

I’m a Gym Leader, but I like to sneak in
treats between training sessions!
Would you like half of my Pasio chocolates?
I happened to get the last ones...
What?! Are you sure?!
Of course! Here, take some!

If you’ve a sweet tooth, I’m sure you’ll find
them hard to resist!
Thanks! I appreciate the generosity!
Ooomph! These taste exquisite!

Thank you, young lady! These are fantastic.
I’m hooked!

OK, then! Next time, I’ll have to find a way
to get a whole box! WAHAHAH!

He looks a little intense. But he does
like sweets...
He reminds me of one of my teacher friends!

I couldn’t help sharing my Pasio chocolates
with him!
Oh! Hi, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
Hm? You know each other?
Yup!
I see. What a coincidence!
Rosa’s been teaching me about Pasio!

We were just getting excited, because
apparently, Rosa’s mom used to work
at a Pokémon Center, too!

Did you know that,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?

I was surprised you worked at a Pokémon
Center too, Ms. Miriam!
It can be pretty tough sometimes...

But when you see Pokémon leave happier
and healthier than when they arrived, it’s all
worth it.

The only reason we can go on adventures is
because Pokémon Centers are there for us!

I’m sure the staff would be pleased to
hear that.
Rosa is such an honest, cheerful child...
Her mom must be lovely, too!
